about.title: About Our Riad
about.description: Nestled in the heart of the ancient Medina, Riad Serenity offers a peaceful haven amid the vibrant bustle of Marrakech. Our meticulously restored 18th-century home combines traditional Moroccan craftsmanship with modern comforts.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: An authentic Moroccan experience
about.history: Built in the 18th century as a merchant's home, our riad has been lovingly restored to preserve its historic charm while offering modern comforts. Each room features handcrafted details by local artisans.
about.experience: At Riad Serenity, we aim to provide an immersive experience of Moroccan hospitality. From our traditional breakfast in the courtyard to mint tea on the rooftop terrace, every moment is designed to create lasting memories.
about.teamDesc: Our staff consists of local Marrakechis who take pride in sharing their culture and ensuring your stay is perfect in every way.
